dcterms:creator: F. M. Harper
J. A. Konstan
dcterms:description: A stable benchmark dataset based on user ratings on watching movies on the MovieLens website collected during different periods. Ratings are given on a 5-star scale, with each user having at least 20 ratings.
dcterms:title: MovieLens-100k

dcterms:creator: F. M. Harper
J. A. Konstan
dcterms:description: A larger version of the MovieLens dataset, containing user ratings on movies, collected over a longer period. Each user has at least 20 ratings, and the dataset includes more diverse user interactions.
dcterms:title: MovieLens-1M

dcterms:creator: C.-N. Ziegler
S. M. McNee
J. A. Konstan
G. Lausen
dcterms:description: A dataset containing user ratings and book information from the BookCrossing website, which is more sparse than MovieLens, containing more user and item information but fewer interactions.
dcterms:title: BookCrossing

dcterms:creator: F. Zhu
Y. Wang
C. Chen
G. Liu
X. Zheng
dcterms:description: A dataset containing user ratings and book information from the Douban website, which is also more sparse than MovieLens, containing more user and item information but fewer interactions.
dcterms:title: Douban-Book

dcterms:creator: J.-C. Shi
Y. Yu
Q. Da
S.-Y. Chen
A.-X. Zeng
dcterms:description: A virtual dataset that simulates a real-world online retail environment for reinforcement learning, trained using genuine data points from Taobao, one of China's largest online retail sites.
dcterms:title: VirtualTaobao
